Nightmare bent over to pick up his brother, but the EMP wave hits him,
and his body fizzles with electricity as he falls over. Spinister,
kneels, and grips for something, but shares the same fate, as his two
guns unfold, and transform into their organic robot modes. Singe begins
"Ohhh no." in a worried tone. Spasma looks over, "Yes, it's happening."

______________________________________________________________________

Meanwhile Strafe falls to the ground, cluching his chest. In the storage
hangar Hoist suffers the same fate, as others fall around him, Grimlock
looks down at all the following Autobots in disgust, then buckles to one
knee, but fights, as he crawls over to a window. He looks out, as his
optics widden at the Worm hole open up. "We in deep exhaust." He
notices, seeing to figueres fly beside them.
______________________________________________________________________
Slugslinger is having problems keeping in a straight path, then his
engines die out, as he is sucked into the worm hole ungracefully,
hitting the Autobot shuttle, and bouncing off of it through a wing, and
then his movement ceases. Caliburst looks from the inside. "Whoa big
guy, you better not be out of energy and stranded." he notes, as they
drift silently in the large void. Then slowly he is drawn foreward.
"What, what's going on?" Caliburst asks, unveiling his uncaring demeanor
into one of fear for a minute, as he reads the instruments functioning
on emergency power. Gravitational force was pulling them down. He began
to heat up, and burn as a ball of fire, as he descends quickly, his
armour fizzling, until he bounces of the crashed autobot ship's wing,
and the smaller ship lands, leaving a crater beside it. Caliburst opens
the cockpit, "This dosent look good." he notes, looking at his enemies
large base.
